lines.text:
[to Count Oga]
You needn't make it sound as if I enjoy annihilating children. I only do it when it's... unavoidable.
[hawking an all-purpose "medicine" called Yuk]
Become the envy of your friends. Surprise your wife. You, lady, grow a beard and surprise your husband!
[The Stooges come upon Snow White sleeping in the Seven Dwarves' cottage]
The dwarves must lend this place to everybody.
You can count on us.
Come what may.
Ad infinitum.
I wish there were more of us. And prettier.
At ease, young man.
Salutations.
Ad infinitum.

[to the Stooges]
I love you just as you are, all three of you.
Gee. Only our mother ever said that without laughing in our faces.
Aren't you going to kiss my hand?
I always say it with flowers.
[gives her a flower]
Only one?
I get tongue-tied.

[to the Prince]
You're better than we ever were.
Yeah, but he cheats... he's got brains!
That last lot of onions you sent us, even a pig wouldn't eat.
Maybe you just weren't hungry.
